text: Although results in its core telecoms operations on both sides of the Atlantic were strong, Hoettges said that IT services unit T-Systems was underperforming as the coronavirus pandemic hit orders and revenue.The transformation of our systems solutions business ... is not progressing as we would like, Hoettges said in remarks prepared for delivery to reporters.Group net debt including leases grew by 3.6 billion euros to 124.5 billion euros in the quarter, putting the leverage ratio based on that metric at 2.9 times.
